thread.title: Hockey India reduces ban on midfielder Gurbaj Singh
thread.title_full: Hockey India reduces ban on midfielder Gurbaj Singh - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Hockey India reduces ban on midfielder Gurbaj Singh
text:
*New Delhi:* Gurbaj Singh is eligible to play with immediate effect after Hockey India (HI) reduced the nine-month ban imposed on the senior India midfielder on Saturday.
The duration of the ban imposed on Gurbaj was from August 10 till May 9 next year after assistant coach Jude Felix had submitted a report post the conclusion ... Â»
